title: I accidentally installed android 12 because i thought it was a normal update now i cant set up phone
content: I accidentally installed android 12 beta thinking that it was a normal update and when I uninstalled it and tried to set up my device it wouldn't let me, it would keep asking for my previous pin and even though I put it in correctly it just goes back to the the previous screen
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
